# Weekly Discussion Prompt Template

Title:
`Weekly Challenge: Week [N] - [Focus Topic]`

Body:
1. Goal for this week:
2. Required task:
3. Optional stretch task:
4. Where to ask questions: `Q&A` discussions
5. Deadline/timezone:
6. How to submit proof (PR link, screenshot, or short summary):

Closing note:
`If you get blocked, post in Q&A using the support template discussion.`
